description:
encoding/xml: move Unmarshal example to function

This also fixes MarshalIndent's example after the
recent formatting convention changes.

Fixes issue 2831.

messages.text:
http://codereview.appspot.com/5671062/diff/1002/src/pkg/encoding/xml/read.go
File src/pkg/encoding/xml/read.go (left):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5671062/diff/1002/src/pkg/encoding/xml/read.go#oldcode75
src/pkg/encoding/xml/read.go:75: // Note that the field r.Phone has not been modified and
Please add some explanatory text before the Example func (it will look
like a doc comment but not be written like one; don't mention the ExampleFunction name) to emphasize things like this.  The point that r.Phone does not get modified is important to say explicitly.  Thanks.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=98061205e2d4 ***

encoding/xml: move Unmarshal example to function

This also fixes MarshalIndent's example after the
recent formatting convention changes.

Fixes issue 2831.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
